description: Structured information about a property of some entity or process whose value is a number.
label: Numerical property
name: NumericalProperty

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this numerical property.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/value._instruction: Enter all quantitative values that are described by this numerical property.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/value.label: Value
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/value.name: value
